description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Transform your avatar into a Wizard and unleash your power in this 8 player FPS.  Cast fireballs, conjure shields of flame and scribe explosive wards as a Warlock.  Shoot lightning, summon mirror images and call forth soul-draining seekers as a Necromancer.  Fire magic missiles, cast teleportation and evoke true sight to hunt your enemies as a Sorcerer.
description.short: Transform your avatar into a Wizard and unleash your power in this 8 player FPS.  Cast fireballs, conjure shields of flame and scribe explosive wards as a Warlock.  Shoot lightning, summon mirror images and call forth soul-draining seekers as a Necromancer.  Fire magic missiles, cast teleportation and evoke true sight to hunt your enemies as a Sorcerer.
